full_text:
Page 67
Re: Epstein
From: Shirley V. Skipper-Scott
To: Ray Ormond
Date: 2019/07/25 13:39
Subject: Re: Epstein
Attachments: TEXT.htm
I sure will.
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: Ray Ormond [b(6); b(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Date: 7/25/19 12:55 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: "Shirley V. Skipper-Scott [b(6); b(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Subject: Re: Epstein
>>> "Ray Ormond" 07/25/2019 12:55 >>>
Thanks. Let me know his status in the morning after evaluated by Psychology, and let me know the status of his incident report. Thanks Shirley.
J. Ray Ormond
Regional Director
Northeast Region
215-521-[b(6); b(7)(C)]
>>> Shirley V. Skipper-Scott 7/25/2019 11:26 AM >>>
Good Morning,
Inmate Epstein was assessed by Psychologist services and it has been determined he will remain on Psychological Observation for another day. Thanks.
Shirley Skipper-Scott
Associate Warden
MCC New York
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
Office: 646-836-[b(6); b(7)(C)]
Black Berry: 646-423-[b(6); b(7)(C)]
[b(6); b(7)(C) @bop.gov
>>> Ray Ormond 7/24/2019 12:16 PM >>>
Thanks Shirley.
Page 245
DOJ-OGR-00024706
